'''Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup is obtainable from [[Bubu Pharmacy]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup decreases [[Stamina]] depleted by sprinting for all party members by '''15'''/'''20'''/'''25'''% for 900 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Yun Jin|Cloud-Shrouded Jade}}
